name: Waterfall Prisoner
description:
You awaken in a damp cell, located in the deepest basement of the mysterious Waterfall Tower.

In making your way out, you discover you weren't the first in this predicament, someone preceded you - and they left behind hints that might help you abscond before the night is over.

A compact videogame experience that aims to evoke the classic, puzzle-centered adventure games of the past.


     RIDDLES AND CONTRAPTIONS

Solve a variety of puzzles and interact with the strange mechanisms that stand before you and the tower's exit.




     THE KEY TO EGRESS

Discover and utilize a diverse set of items, essential in enabling your escape.




     THE SECRETS OF WATERFALL TOWER

Exploring the tower and learning about the quirks of its strange inhabitants will be paramount to making progress.
